name: A blood-red shield with a black rose on it
data: It increases the users strength slightly.
It increases the users dexterity slightly.
It decreases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It increases the users wisdom a bit.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (poor in general).
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'weapon skill 1h polearm'.
It increases the users poison resistance adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
